ygData.subject: SV: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: MUUUUUHHHHHAAAAAAA You can never leave this list !! you have to change your e-mail if you want that!! ... From: donna reed  To:
ygData.messageBody:
MUUUUUHHHHHAAAAAAA

You can never leave this list !! you have to change your e-mail if you want that!!





----- Original Message -----
From: donna reed <myracle44@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 5:58 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Question


> From: "donna reed" <myracle44@...>
>
> HOW DO I GET OFF THIS LIST ?????? PLEASE ??
>
>
> >From: "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...>
> >Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> >To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> >Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Question

> >

> >
> >I always target the mob that our tanks are beating on.. i mainly only use

> >after me..
> >
> >
> >----- Original Message -----

> > > not med, nor does our mana song or clarity help, just sitting. so how

> >mana.
> > >
> > > Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> > > Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
